Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is tailored to meet your unique needs and valued at $1200000 to you. I understand the importance of this investment to you and am confident that it will significantly contribute to your success and growth. To make this acquisition even more attractive, I am offering you the chance to secure this valuable asset at a special introductory price of $1050000. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for a limited time only. I believe this represents an exceptional value, allowing you to maximize your return on investment while securing a piece of cutting-edge technology that is sure to propel your endeavors forward. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any additional information you require to make an informed decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,050,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,050,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
